adm:managed-object.name: plugin-root
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis:
The
defines the parent entry for all plug-ins defined in the server.
adm:managed-object.adm:description: It can also include configuration attributes that define the order in which those plug-ins are to be loaded and invoked.

adm:property.name: plugin-order-startup
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the order in which startup plug-ins are to be loaded and invoked.
adm:property.adm:description: The value is a comma-delimited list of plug-in names (where the plug-in name is the RDN value from the plug-in configuration entry DN). The list can include at most one asterisk to indicate the position of any unspecified plug-in (and the relative order of those unspecified plug-ins is undefined).

adm:alias.adm:synopsis: The order in which startup plug-ins are loaded and invoked is undefined.

adm:property.name: plugin-order-shutdown
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the order in which shutdown plug-ins are to be loaded and invoked.
adm:property.adm:description: The value is a comma-delimited list of plug-in names (where the plug-in name is the RDN value from the plug-in configuration entry DN). The list can include at most one asterisk to indicate the position of any unspecified plug-in (and the relative order of those unspecified plug-ins is undefined).

adm:alias.adm:synopsis: The order in which shutdown plug-ins are loaded and invoked is undefined.
